name: vizscript
description: A complete language extension for Viz Script. Auto complete, syntax checking, syntax highlighting, signature help, jump to definition and more.
author: Fredrik Hareide

commands.title: Viz Script: Set current script in Viz
Viz Script: Get scripts from Viz

commandPalette.when: editorLangId == viz || editorLangId == viz-con || editorLangId == viz4 || editorLangId == viz4-con
editorLangId == viz || editorLangId == viz-con || editorLangId == viz4 || editorLangId == viz4-con

keybindings.when: editorLangId == viz || editorLangId == viz-con || editorLangId == viz4 || editorLangId == viz4-con
editorLangId == viz || editorLangId == viz-con || editorLangId == viz4 || editorLangId == viz4-con

vizscript.showThisCompletionsOnRoot.description: Show completions for Container/Scene on root

vizscript.showEventSnippetCompletionsOnR.description: Show Event snippet completions on root

vizscript.enableSignatureHelp.description: Enable Signature Help for both built-in and custom procedures

vizscript.enableDefinition.description: Enable Jump to Definition for easy navigation

vizscript.enableGlobalProcedureSnippets.description: Enable snippet completions for Global Procedures

vizscript.compiler.hostName.description: The hostname for connection to Viz Engine

vizscript.compiler.hostPort.description: The port number for connection to Viz Engine

vizscript.compiler.liveSyntaxChecking.description: Check syntax on Viz Engine while you write code

vizscript.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Viz language server.

scripts.webpack: npm run clean && webpack --mode production --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode production --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack-dev: npm run clean && webpack --mode development --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode development --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.development: npm run webpack-dev && npm run watch
